verses.roman:
tabe śrīvāsa tāra vṛttānta kahila
yaiche saṅkalpa, yaiche triveṇī praveśila

synonyms: tabe—at that time; śrīvāsa—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; tāra—of Junior Haridāsa; vṛttānta—story; kahila—spoke; yaiche—how; saṅkalpa—he decided; yaiche—how; triveṇī praveśila—he entered the waters at the confluence of the Ganges and Yamunā.
translation: Then Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura related the details of Haridāsa's decision and his entering the waters at the confluence of the Ganges and Yamunā.
